docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, April 1 Apprehensions about a revived militancy by Prime Minister Fidel Castro of Cuba have caused the collapse of a conference of Latin American leaders scheduled for June in Panama, a Panamanian official said today.

docs.snippet: A year ago, 11 of the 23 stores on 37th Avenue from 92d to 93d Street in the Jackson Heights section of Queens were vacant. Today all are in business, opening as early as 8 in the morning and sometimes still serving customers at 11 at night.
